name: the rider without head
description:
The goal is that the peasants (characters in blue)do not touch the door of the castle,
if 10 touch it is Game Over same if the soldiers touch you (characters in gray)


The king(character in yellow) gives you a lot of special and points
Arrow keys to move, left click to shoot and right for special
Code and graph by Thesandgamer, music by kwandjeen
